channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Is Blocking Out the Sun: Three Writers on the Politics of the Guilty Verdict
item.description: Trump sort of photosynthesizes any and all attention to grow bigger and stronger. What’s Biden to do?

item.title: Middle East Crisis: U.S. Officials Return to Mideast to Push for Cease-Fire
item.description: The C.I.A. director and a Middle East envoy were set to meet with regional officials as President Biden tries to raise pressure on Israel and Hamas to agree to a deal.

item.title: Bill Gates says he was a 'misfit' as a kid who clashed with his parents and almost got kicked out of college
item.description: "I’ve been in the public eye since my early twenties, but much of my life before then isn’t well known."

item.title: Behind President Biden’s Immigration Executive Order
item.description: We explore the story behind the president’s immigration order.

item.title: U.S. Embassy in Beirut Targeted With Gunfire
item.description: An attacker was wounded and arrested, the Lebanese Army said. An embassy security guard was injured.

item.title: U.K. teachers, who feel like they're ‘severely underpaid,’ are spending their own money to help students, study finds
item.description: Students' conditions have deteriorated, leaving them unable to meet basic well-being needs owing to the cost of living crisis.

item.title: U.S. Embassy in Beirut Targeted With Gunfire
item.description: An attacker was wounded and arrested, the Lebanese Army said. An embassy security guard was injured.

item.title: It’s Wedding Season: Here Come the Owls
item.description: What better way to deliver the rings to the bride and groom?

item.title: How crypto could put Donald Trump over the top in November
item.description: Donald's Trump recent embrace of crypto could prove especially costly for Democrats.

item.title: It’s Crazy to Think Trump Wants to Be a Felon
item.description: The truth of the former president is very far from the myth.

item.title: Rob Burrow, Rugby Star and A.L.S. Campaigner, Dies at 41
item.description: The “Mighty Atom” enjoyed a glittering professional career in Britain before gaining more acclaim for his charity efforts after a diagnosis of motor neuron disease.

item.title: Zoom founder Eric Yuan wants ‘digital twins’ to attend meetings for you so you can ‘go to the beach’ instead
item.description: You'll only need to work 3 days a week because your digital twin will do 90% of your work, Zoom’s founder and CEO Eric Yuan said.

item.title: Israel Secretly Targets U.S. Lawmakers, and Biden Visits Europe
item.description: Plus, what our reporter witnessed in Sudan.

item.title: Amanda Knox Testifies at Slander Retrial in Italy
item.description: The American, who spent several years in jail but was exonerated in 2015 of the killing of her housemate in Italy, is defending herself against a charge related to the case.

item.title: Virgin Media sues Irish scallop fishers for $870,000 for alleged damage to underwater cable
item.description: Virgin Media Wholesale alleges the MV The Lida Suzanna didn't take care to check for cables before dredging the Irish Sea bed in search of scallops.
